title: HELP IM STUCK IN GAME!!!!!
body: Hey Riot my internet cut out for a period of 1 minute in game. During this time i am on the screen attempting to reconnect. However my team has already won the game, but it has been attempting to reconnect for 10 minutes now when the game is already over. This is ranked i don't wanna quit because i don't want this to count as a provisional loss. Please help me??

replies.body:
If you left the game within only a minute or so of it finishing it should still count you as having completed it. The effect afterwards sounds like a "ghost game" and this can sometimes last up to two hours but restarting your client and/or computer can fix the issue.
You shouldn't have any issues getting into a new game now but if you do then please [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) through our support site.
Thank you for your help, restarted the client and i am able to play a new game by the looks of it and the game i was stuck in has counted as a win :) thank you
